about.title: Dunia Safari Tours
about.description1: From stadium roars to desert stars, we specialize in curated experiences that celebrate both Africa's biggest sporting events and Morocco's timeless beauty.
about.description2: We deliver our DESTINATION's heartbeat, authentic moments, immersive culture, and memories no generic package can match.
about.trustedDescription: Vetted partners, licensed guides, WhatsApp check-ins, clear meeting points, and practical tips to smooth out the little frictions that make or break a trip.
about.budgetDescription: We design custom itineraries that feel premium without the price tag. You see the total cost upfront, no fluff!
about.curatedDescription: 3 Adventures (e.g. desert safari, waterfalls, Atlas mountains). 3 Slow moments (e.g. Berber village visit, sunset walks, hammam).

carousel.slide1Subtitle: Travel, celebrate, and make memories that last a lifetime.
carousel.slide2Subtitle: From Sahara dunes to Atlas peaks, adventure meets culture.
carousel.slide3Subtitle: Souks, lanterns, and flavors you'll never forget.
carousel.slide4Subtitle: Hike the Atlas mountains and explore Morocco's beauty.
carousel.joinWhatsApp: Join Our WhatsApp Community for updates

groupPerks.title: Group Travel Perks

groupPerks.sharedDescription: Traveling as a group makes every moment richer — from cheering together at AFCON stadiums to bonding over desert sunsets and city adventures.
groupPerks.discountsDescription: Enjoy lower rates on flights, hotels, and experiences when you travel as part of a group.
groupPerks.hassleFreeDescription: We handle the logistics (flights, transfers, tours, tickets), so your group can simply relax and enjoy

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about AFCON 2025 travel packages
faq.stillHaveQuestions: Still have questions? We're here to help!
faq.question0: What games do the AFCON packages cover?
faq.question3: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.question4: What is the difference between the Bronze, Silver, and Gold packages?
faq.question5: Do you only operate in Morocco?
faq.question6: What is Dunia Safari's refund policy?
faq.answer0: Our packages include 2 games in Fes, Rabat & Marrakech for Nigerian, Tanzanian and Ivorian fans respectively, blending football with culture and exploration. Want 3 games plus New Year in Morocco? Contact our travel agent for the extended itinerary.
faq.answer1:
Book early — Christmas/New Year has high demand and higher rates.

Steps:

  1. 1. Select your package on the website.
  2. 2. A travel agent will contact you via WhatsApp within 24 hours for flights, insurance & visa support.
  3. 3. Pay before the deadline to receive flight, hotel & stadium ticket confirmations.
  4. 4. Be added to our WhatsApp broadcast group for updates.
faq.answer2:
Q: — For Ghanaian passport holders.

A: — No visa required. You must complete Morocco's Electronic Travel Authorization (Accès Maroc) online before travel (typically processed within ~24 hours).

Q: — For Ivorian & Nigerian passport holders.

A: — Yes, Visa required. If you hold a valid Schengen/US/UK/Canada visa or residence permit, you can usually apply online for a Morocco eVisa.

Otherwise, apply at the Moroccan consulate in Abidjan & Abuja

Typical Visa processing is around 10 business days, but you need to secure your visa appointment at least 3 weeks in advance
faq.answer3:
A: — We accept debit/credit cards (Visa/Mastercard), bank transfer, and mobile money (for Ghana only). If your preferred method isn't listed, contact our travel agent for alternatives.

Q: —How are exchange rates handled?

A: — For cross-currency payments, we use the prevailing market rate at the time of invoicing/checkout. Your bank or provider may apply a small FX margin.

Q: — Will I receive a receipt?

A: — Yes. Reciept are issued within 24hours after each payment.
faq.answer4: The Bronze Package offers room sharing in a riad or hostel and the essential AFCON travel experience. The Silver and Gold Packages upgrade you to private rooms in 2-star and 3-star hotels, respectively, and include added experiences such as a hammam spa and visa application support. For full details, please refer to the individual package descriptions.
faq.answer5: Our launch focus is Morocco. Especially trips aligned with AFCON 2025 and holiday packages, but our long-term vision includes Egypt, Cape Verde, Turkey, and other exciting destinations across the world
faq.answer6: Deposits are generally non-refundable, as they secure your flight, hotel, and match tickets. Depending on the situation, Dunia Safari may reschedule your booking to a later date or allow you to transfer your package to another traveler if you are unable to travel yourself. Terms & conditions apply.
